body.name: Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash (Light Novel) Vol. 4
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews About the Author Ao Jyumonji is a Japanese author best known for the Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash light novels. Eiri Shirai is a Japanese manga artist best known for the illustrations in Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash.

body.description: THE BITTER TASTE OF VICTORY The aftermath of the violent battle at Deadhead Watching Keep is hitting Haruhiro and his party hard. Though they have fallen comrades to mourn, they must soldier on–and it’s not going to get any easier. Thanks to their successes in battle, other groups are taking a close look at Haruhiro’s party and they’ve got one thing in mind: poaching his teammates. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect it, but I liked the direction that this book took. I enjoyed this one, and I will gladly go get the next one :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reflection, loss, remembrance and growth
reviews.reviewText: Volume 4 covers another period of growth and development of the party overall. Gaining new skills and battle experiences along the way. Yet, this volume starts out with a real kick to the teeth. Haruhiro and his party are forced to face the reality of the harsh and unexpected consequences after the battle of Deadhead Watching Keep presented in the last volume.For me, this volume really sank in the meaning of the novels title."Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash"Parties forced to bury the ashes of dead comrades in the cruel fantasy world known as Grimgar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I feel like everyone of these I finish I am just speechless.
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes the point where I quite literally, unironically, hang my jaw with my eyes popping out if their sockets. So first of all, if you don't have something, anything, but especially some type of book that does this to you, I'm sorry for you. Second (response to the afterword), to hell with video games the mind is much more powerful. WOW, Dark souls, any game at all, to hell with them over what this brain can do with some text on a screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST READ!!!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t put this series down! The author pulls you in with every page and keeps you wanting more. Ao Jyumonji, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Yup, this novel is as good as the third volume. I personally liked the 3rd one a bit better than this volume but it's still VERY good. I couldn't put my phone down to stop reading. Looks like I'm on to the 5th volume. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Got the feel of gaming, both in an RPG and a LARP pretty good. I haven’t been to a LARP in a while but because of this series, I’ll probably go back as soon as the state of the pandemic allows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The team struggles on
reviews.reviewText: Part 4 deals with them trying to move forwards after the events of book 3 half the book is them dealing with aftermath the rest is them fighting in new area. the book feel like the second half of book 3 an is more of the same if you enjoy yourself up till now it worth your time. the jp version has 9 volumes were we have 4 so i hope we get more as the adventure does continue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Loved everything aboutloved the character developmentHaru stepping up as the leader of the groupLove all the side character in this Novel.
The fights here wete spot on, i felt the adrenaline and the relief reading the last fight! Thank you so much!
Un nouveau territoire a explorer pour Haruhiro et son groupe, avec son lot de surprise et de dangers... ce monde se montre toujours plus cruel.

A Amazon mais uma vez impressionou em seu serviço, pois eu fiz o pedido num dia próximo ao final de semana e no período da noite, mas mesmo assim na virada do dia, aproximadamente 01:30 eles postaram o pedido e no dia seguinte já estava na transportadora que mais uma vez entregou muito rápido!Quanto a Light Novel, achei que a história continuou de forma legal apresentando diversas novas situações, como também uma surpresa logo no inicio e novos personagens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: A strong continuation of the story
reviews.reviewText: The story is well paced, this book differs from the others in that it gives you a peek at the other party members thoughts and feelings which is quite a nice touch and gives the story it's highs and lows. The combat is still thrilling and there isn't too much jargon so it's easy to understand.
